'''1.18.30.0''' (Windows, macOS, iOS, iPadOS) or '''1.18.30.1''' (ChromeOS, Android) is the second beta version of [[Education Edition 1.18.32]], released on June 16, 2022.<ref name=changelog2>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20220618172009/https://educommunity.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/4484636118420-What-s-New-in-the-Beta|title=What's New in the Beta|website=Minecraft: Education Edition Support}}</ref> The update brought features from [[Bedrock Edition 1.18.30]] to ''[[Education Edition]]'' and added Android, iPhone, and iPod touch support.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
{{main|Bedrock Edition 1.18.30}}
* Added features from [[Bedrock Edition 1.18.30]].
* Added Android, iPhone, and iPod touch support.</onlyinclude>
